commit.message:
stmt.c (expand_return): Call start_cleanup_deferral and end_cleanup_deferral around conditional code.

	* stmt.c (expand_return): Call start_cleanup_deferral and
	end_cleanup_deferral around conditional code.

From-SVN: r27018

files.patch:

+	end_cleanup_deferral around conditional code.
